ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Request for 418 Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Request for 418') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True,
OR( ISBLANK( NS_Equipment__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete the Equipment Number(s) prior to closing the Case.
